page.title: 07Garvald Pets
page.content: Apart from fish in pools and indoor tanks, there are rabbits in hutches, she goats with kids, hens & a large cock, which is frequently gathered in the arms of a tiny girl & carried about, to its evident delight There are a few resident cats and even moribund baby hedgehogs have been rescued and survived to hibernate successfully. Dogs number 18, mostly pedigreed of several breeds. Two trusted unemployed girls benefit from the fees they earn for feeding and exercising two dogs whose owners are at work. Conversely, a city dog weekends here. An aged arthritic dog is wheeled in its carriage to the haugh for gentle exercise. Pets lives are paradisal in Garvald..
